citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on
07/21/2016. Licensee was contacted by phone and it was determined that no responsible adult was available to
accompany APHIS Official on an inspection. This was to be a new site inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on
07/21/2016.  Licensee was contacted by phone and it was determined that no responsible adult was available to
accompany APHIS Official on an inspection.  This was to be a new site inspection.
